commit.message:
transparent download/upload (de)compression [DEVINFRA-491] (#174)

Adds "transparent (de)compression" for upload and download, two new API functions are added:
- `esthri::upload_compressed`
- `esthri::download_decompressed`

For upload, the file is simply compressed in serial prior to upload, this works will with concurrent uploading so that we can easily know what the final size of the file is.

For download, it was a little more complex, decompression is weaved into the download process so a new trait was created and the download "strategy" was abstracted into a trait.

Misc: switched to `impl AsRef<..>` for a lot of the parameters since it removed the weirdly named type parameters like `SR0` and `SR1` that needed to be unique in case a caller was using different types for each parameter.

transparent download/upload (de)compression [DEVINFRA-491] (#174)

Adds "transparent (de)compression" for upload and download, two new API functions are added:
- `esthri::upload_compressed`
- `esthri::download_decompressed`

For upload, the file is simply compressed in serial prior to upload, this works will with concurrent uploading so that we can easily know what the final size of the file is.

For download, it was a little more complex, decompression is weaved into the download process so a new trait was created and the download "strategy" was abstracted into a trait.

Misc: switched to `impl AsRef<..>` for a lot of the parameters since it removed the weirdly named type parameters like `SR0` and `SR1` that needed to be unique in case a caller was using different types for each parameter.
